name: Montenegro ( Dubrovnik - Herceg Novi - Perast - Kotor - Lovcen - Budva - Tivat - Dubrovnik )
description: I propose plan, but your decision is how much time you want to spend in any of places :) Also I always give my best that you get maximum experience and feel spirit of any place which we are going to visit. Due this reason I start with tour early in the morning and finish at midnight.
